Name.markdownDescription:
Name of the apiDestination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Pattern: [\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 512  
Update requires: No interruption

ConnectionArn.markdownDescription:
The arn of the connection.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z]|\-)*:events:([a-z]|\d|\-)*:([0-9]{12})?:connection/[\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+/[\-A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The arn of the api destination.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The arn of the api destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z]|\-)*:events:([a-z]|\d|\-)*:([0-9]{12})?:api-destination/[\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+/[\-A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

InvocationRateLimitPerSecond.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

InvocationEndpoint.markdownDescription:
Url endpoint to invoke.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^((%[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}|[-()_.!~*';/?:@\x26=+$,A-Za-z0-9])+)([).!';/?:,])?$  
Update requires: No interruption

HttpMethod.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: GET | HEAD | POST | OPTIONS | PUT | DELETE | PATCH  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: The arn of the api destination.
Arn.markdownDescription:
The arn of the api destination.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws([a-z]|\-)*:events:([a-z]|\d|\-)*:([0-9]{12})?:api-destination/[\.\-_A-Za-z0-9]+/[\-A-Za-z0-9]+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
